<h1 align="center">Hi 👋, I'm Giriraj Bidwai</h1>
<h3 align="center">I am a sophomore student pursuing a degree in Computer Science with a strong interest in data engineering and Web Development. I have a solid foundation in programming languages such as Python and C++, and have experience working with SQL databases. During my academic projects, I have developed skills in data processing, data warehousing, and data analysis. I am passionate about using data to solve complex problems and help businesses make informed decisions. I am open to internships or part-time positions that will allow me to work alongside experienced professionals and further develop my skills. In my free time, I enjoy participating in coding competitions, attending tech meetups, and learning about new technologies. If you're interested in connecting or have any opportunities that you think would be a good fit, feel free to reach out to me!</h3>

- 🔭 I’m currently working on **IPL DATA ANALYSIS**

- 🌱 I’m currently learning **Data Engineering,Web Development and Devops.**

- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on **data engineering or web development project which align with my goals and help me in fostering a great career path and network.**

- 📝 I regularly write articles on [medium](medium)

- 💬 Ask me about **Spark,Kafka,ReactJS,NodeJS,ExpressJS,MongoDB,AWS,Docker.**

- 📫 How to reach me **girirajatwork@gmail.com**
